## ɵj.transform() method

Transforms selected option into boolean indication if there is option selected

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transform(options: NgSelectOption<TValue> | Array<NgSelectOption<TValue>>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [NgSelectOption](./select.ngselectoption.md)<!-- -->&lt;TValue&gt; \| Array&lt;[NgSelectOption](./select.ngselectoption.md)<!-- -->&lt;TValue&gt;&gt; | Selected options to be transformed into boolean |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
